CustomField.description:
IT3029749. Field maps to Project Owner
pse__Project__r.Owner:User.FirstName + " " + pse__Project__r.Owner:User.LastName
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Project Manager or Project Coordinator responsible for Operational functions on the Project such as: Customer Engagement Scheduling, Resource Staffing, Assignment Mgmt, Billing/Revenue Recognition Mgmt.
CustomField.label: Project Owner
